text: India Vision Institute (IVI) and Arcot Foundation conducted a flood relief vision screening campaign at Amir Mahal for those affected by floods, according to a press release. The campaign was jointly launched by the Dewan to the Prince of Arcot Nawabzada Mohammed Asif Ali and IVI CEO Vinod Daniel, the release said. Free spectacles will be provided to those with refractive errors. —staff reporter
title: Flood relief vision screening drive
